title: Late-stage tech backer Liquidity raises $775M for its fintech platform from Apollo and MUFG - TechCrunch
content: Late-stage tech backer Liquidity raises $775M for its fintech platform from Apollo and MUFG  TechCrunch
description: Liquidity Group, which funds later-stage technology companies, has announced a new raise of $775 million from private equity house Apollo and MUFG Bank.
